Now you have seen the process on how to solve a routine word problem Always remember to follow the process: Understand, Plan, Execute (Solve) and Review(check). Take note of the different keywords used in the word problems that will guide you on which mathematical operation you will use.

Further, you will be learning the steps in solving non-routine word problems. This will be easy because you already have the basic skills and strategies in solving word problems.

Answering non-routine problems are quite challenging but it will be easier to solve if we will follow the steps or the processes on how to simplify it. All you need is to have a STRATEGY to get the correct answer. Read the Word Problem below and don’t forget to follow the process: Understand, Plan, strategize, Execute; and Review

Problem 2

Ana have to save a money from her allowance. During the first week, she was able to save 88.65 pesos, she saved 96.00 on the second week, 69.40 for third week. If she had an average savings of 87.55, how much will be her savings on the fourth week?

Step 1. Understand

• What is asked?
➢ Ana’ s savings on the fourth week (her refers to Ana)
• What are the given facts?
➢ P 88.65 Ana’s savings during the first week
➢ P 96.00 during the second week
➢ P 69.40 during the third week
➢ P 87.55 average savings of Ana

Step 2. Plan

• What operation will be used?
➢ Choose your own strategy to find the correct answer
▪ STRATEGY 1: Make a table

Steps:

• Find the product of the average savings (87.55) by 4(total number of saving weeks)

87.55 x 4 = 350.20
• Add the savings of Ana for 3 weeks

88.65+96.00+69.40=254.05
• Subtract the sum of the three-week savings of Ana (Step 2) from the product of the average savings of Ana for four weeks (Step1) 

 350.20
 - 254.05
 P 96.15

State your complete answer

Ana’s savings on the fourth week is P 96.15

• To review or to check if your answer is correct, get the sum of the four week savings of Ana.

• Divide the sum of four-week savings of Ana by 4 (number of saving week)350.20 ÷ 4 = 87.55 This means that our answer is correct
